short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to easily convert different units of measure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convertool is a simple and quick tool to convert different units of measure. It works with units of distance, mass, volume, and temperature. It detects universal abbreviations and 6 languages: English, Spanish, French, Portguese, Italian, and German. More on the way!
